metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19601 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: OpenDetex 2.8.5 has a Buffer Overflow in TexOpen in detex.l because of an incorrect sprintf.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> affected code is built inside #ifndef KPATHSEA. Debian/Ubuntu doesn't build affected code.

criterions.comment: texlive-bin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
